en.section6-title: Successful SvS Event: State 214 Prevails Against State 268
en.section6-text1: The SvS event between State 214 and State 268, held from 26 to 31 January 2026, ended with a clear and well-deserved victory for State 214.
en.section6-text2: State 214â€™s strength was already visible during preparation: with excellent organization and committed participation from its members, the state secured key advantages early.
en.section6-text3: The castle battle on 31 January 2026 ran smoothly, structured, and highly professionally. Decisive factors were precise coordination and the close unity of DOA, LOU, and SRC, who fought together in a coordinated and united way. This cooperation proved to be the key to success.
en.section6-text4: State 268 also deserves special recognition for fair and respectful conduct throughout the entire SvS period. The opposing state consistently followed all agreements, showed goodwill, and demonstrated characterâ€”especially during the castle battle. There were no forbidden attacks, and all agreements were fully respected.
en.section6-text5: In summary, the SvS event was a complete success for State 214, crowned by taking control of the castle. At the same time, State 268 presented itself as a very fair and respectable state. An SvS event that was competitive, organized, and exemplary.
en.section1-title: One Team â€“ Five Alliances â€“ 30 July
en.section1-text1: From the start, State 214 stood together across multiple alliances with one goal: win as one team.
en.section1-text2: Coordination, respect and shared planning set the tone for the weeks ahead.
en.section2-text1: SvS preparations moved into action: rallies, reinforcement plans and clear roles across alliances.
en.section2-text2: Everyone contributed â€” from fighters to supporters â€” to push the state forward.
en.section3-text1: Strong communication on Discord and in-game made the difference in critical moments.
en.section3-text2: Fast responses, shared strategy and disciplined play kept us united.
en.section4-text1: A hard-fought win â€” achieved through teamwork and commitment across the state.
en.section4-text2: Every alliance played its part: coordination, timing and smart resource use.
en.section4-text3: Thank you to all participants who showed up, followed plans and supported rallies.
en.section4-text4: State 214 proved again: unity is strength.
en.section5-text1: Another major success built on the same foundation: discipline and cooperation.
en.section5-text2: Preparation mattered â€” saving resources and using rewards with SvS in mind.
en.section5-text3: Great leadership, great teamwork and great energy across the community.
en.section5-text4: We keep improving with every event.

it.section6-title: SvS riuscito: lo Stato 214 prevale sullo Stato 268
it.section6-text1: L'evento SvS tra lo Stato 214 e lo Stato 268, svolto dal 26 al 31 gennaio 2026, si Ã¨ concluso con una vittoria chiara e meritata per lo Stato 214.
it.section6-text2: La forza dello Stato era evidente giÃ  nella fase di preparazione: grazie a una preparazione SvS molto ben organizzata e alla partecipazione attiva dei membri, lo Stato 214 ha ottenuto presto i vantaggi decisivi.
it.section6-text3: La battaglia del castello del 31 gennaio 2026 Ã¨ stata fluida, strutturata e altamente professionale. Determinanti sono stati gli accordi precisi e la stretta unione delle alleanze DOA, LOU e SRC, che hanno combattuto insieme in modo coordinato e compatto. Questa collaborazione si Ã¨ rivelata la chiave del successo.
it.section6-text4: Da sottolineare anche il comportamento corretto e rispettoso dello Stato 268 durante tutto il periodo SvS. Lo Stato avversario ha rispettato costantemente gli accordi, ha mostrato buona volontÃ  e ha dimostrato carattere, soprattutto durante la battaglia del castello. Non ci sono stati attacchi vietati e gli accordi sono stati rispettati completamente.
it.section6-text5: In sintesi, l'evento SvS Ã¨ stato un pieno successo per lo Stato 214, coronato dalla conquista del castello. Allo stesso tempo, lo Stato 268 si Ã¨ presentato come uno Stato molto corretto e rispettabile. Un SvS competitivo, organizzato ed esemplare.

it.section2-text2: Tutti hanno contribuito â€” combattenti e supporti â€” per far crescere lo Stato.
it.section3-text1: Una comunicazione forte su Discord e in gioco ha fatto la differenza nei momenti critici.
it.section3-text2: Reazioni rapide, strategia condivisa e disciplina ci hanno mantenuti uniti.
it.section4-text1: Una vittoria combattuta â€” resa possibile dal lavoro di squadra e dall'impegno di tutto lo Stato.

id.section6-title: SvS sukses: State 214 unggul atas State 268
id.section6-text1: Event SvS antara State 214 dan State 268 yang berlangsung pada 26â€“31 Januari 2026 berakhir dengan kemenangan yang jelas dan pantas untuk State 214.
id.section6-text2: Kekuatan State 214 sudah terlihat sejak fase persiapan: dengan persiapan SvS yang sangat terorganisir dan partisipasi anggota yang solid, State 214 mengamankan keunggulan penting sejak awal.
id.section6-text3: Pertempuran kastil pada 31 Januari 2026 berjalan lancar, terstruktur, dan sangat profesional. Faktor penentu adalah koordinasi yang presisi serta kekompakan aliansi DOA, LOU, dan SRC yang bertarung bersama secara terkoordinasi. Kerja sama ini menjadi kunci kemenangan.
id.section6-text4: Perlu juga diapresiasi sikap adil dan penuh respek dari State 268 sepanjang SvS. Pihak lawan konsisten mematuhi semua kesepakatan, menunjukkan itikad baik, dan berkarakter khususnya saat pertempuran kastil. Tidak ada serangan terlarang, dan semua kesepakatan dihormati sepenuhnya.
id.section6-text5: Kesimpulannya, SvS ini adalah sukses besar bagi State 214, ditutup dengan pengambilalihan kastil. Di saat yang sama, State 268 tampil sebagai state yang sangat fair dan terhormat. SvS yang kompetitif, rapi, dan patut dicontoh.
id.section1-title: Satu Tim â€“ Lima Aliansi â€“ 30 Juli
id.section1-text1: Sejak awal, State 214 bersatu lintas beberapa aliansi dengan satu tujuan: menang sebagai satu tim.
id.section1-text2: Koordinasi, rasa hormat, dan perencanaan bersama menjadi dasar minggu-minggu berikutnya.
id.section2-text1: Persiapan SvS berubah menjadi aksi: rally, rencana penguatan, dan peran yang jelas antar aliansi.
id.section2-text2: Semua berkontribusi â€” petarung maupun pendukung â€” untuk mendorong negara maju.
id.section3-text1: Komunikasi kuat di Discord dan dalam game membuat perbedaan di momen krusial.
id.section3-text2: Respon cepat, strategi bersama, dan disiplin menjaga kami tetap satu.
id.section4-text1: Kemenangan yang sulit â€” dicapai lewat kerja sama dan komitmen seluruh negara.
id.section4-text2: Setiap aliansi berperan: koordinasi, timing, dan penggunaan sumber daya yang cerdas.
id.section4-text3: Terima kasih untuk semua yang ikut, mengikuti rencana, dan mendukung rally.
id.section5-text1: Sukses besar lainnya dengan fondasi yang sama: disiplin dan kerja sama.
id.section5-text2: Persiapan itu penting â€” simpan sumber daya dan gunakan hadiah dengan SvS di pikiran.
id.section5-text3: Kepemimpinan hebat, teamwork hebat, dan energi komunitas yang luar biasa.
id.section5-text4: Kami semakin baik di setiap event.
